Interface BabaEntity

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<BabaEntity>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BabaElement, Text
public interface BabaEntity
extends java.lang.Comparable<BabaEntity>
BabaEntity defines either a BabaElement or a Text.

    • checkAndDeleteMeltandHot

      default void checkAndDeleteMeltandHot​(java.util.List<Coordinate> lstcoordshot)
      Check and apply the rule melt and hot.

      Check if the entity is MELT. If yes, remove the coordinate of the entity if the entity is on the list of coordinate : lstcoordshot

      Parameters:
      lstcoordshot - list of coordinate where there is an entity with the property hot

    • checkDefeat

      default void checkDefeat​(java.util.List<Coordinate> lstcoordsdefeat)
      Check and apply the rule defeat.

      Check if the entity is YOU. If yes, remove the coordinate of the entity if the entity is on the list of coordinate : lstcoordsdefeat

      Parameters:
      lstcoordsdefeat - list of coordinate where there is an entity with the property defeat

    • checkWin

      default boolean checkWin​(java.util.List<Coordinate> lstcoordswin)
      Check and apply the rule win.

      Check if the entity is YOU. If yes, returns true if the entity is on the list of coordinate : lstcoordswin

      Parameters:
      lstcoordswin - list of coordinate where there is an entity with the property win
      Returns:
      true, if the entity is YOU and if the entity is on the list of coordinate : lstcoordswin
